InstallationÂ¶

python 3

Installation:

`bash python3 setup.py install --user `

This should automatically install any depedencies.

List of requirements:

  • numpy scipy scikit-learn json ase dscribe umap-learn PyYAML click

Add-Ons: + (for finding symmetries of crystals) spglib + (for annotation without overlaps) adjustText + The FCHL19 representation requires code from the development brach of the QML package. Instructions on how to install the QML package can be found on https://www.qmlcode.org/installation.html.
